Follow me through my reporting process and learn about my life as a student journalist.

Wake of the Storm

My reporting team landed in Manila, Philippines, in early September to report on the ongoing recovery efforts after Typhoon Yolanda. But I had already done substantial reporting before we landed. What was the reporting process like? This post kicks off my reporting at the year-old disaster site. Check out the trip blog in its entirety here: http://yolanda.dailybruin.com/blog/

Sep 5, 2014
